Text:
The Director Mike Robe is great , and the global performance of the movie is good; but Gary Cole as G.A CUSTER is a wrong choice .
 The movie is quite accurate , and it's the closest movie made dedicated to G.A Custer
 Someone with more charisma , more personality  would had made the film excellent
